resume: Talented but troubled high school rugby player Rick Penning  loses his position as the star of an Arizona rugby union team when he is sentenced to a boys' Juvenile Detention Center in Salt Lake City. Rick ends up playing for Salt Lake's notable Highland rugby team, coached by Larry Gelwix , in the national championships—against his old team, who is coached by his father, Richard Penning . Emily  is Rick's love interest, and Marcus  is his guidance counselor.
